Title: RELEASE_ALL_LOCKS()
Description:
Releases all named locks held by the current session and
          returns the number of locks released (0 if there were none)

This function is unsafe for statement-based replication. A
          warning is logged if you use this function when
          binlog_format is set to
          STATEMENT.
EffectiveSQLsGeneratedErrors: (pymysql.err.ProgrammingError) (1064, 'You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your TiDB version for the right syntax to use line 1 column 17 near "RELEASE_ALL_LOCKS()" ')
